name: Dried Cranberry, Cherry and Tomato Relish
keywords: dried cherries, dried cranberries, sun-dried tomato, fall
recipeIngredient: 1 Granny Smith apple, peeled, seeded, cored and cut into 1/4-inch dice

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl, combine the dried cranberries, cherries, tomatoes, cider and 3/4 cup water. Set aside for 30 minutes.

Heat a large saucepan over medium heat and add the oil. Add the shallots and cook, stirring, until they are just tender, about 3 minutes. (Do not let them brown.) Add the dried-fruit-and-cider mixture, the apple, fresh cranberries and orange zest. Cook, stirring occasionally, for 10 minutes. Serve warm or cold.
